Lunarpine leaned his head back a little looking a little 
confused "Why can't you stay with me, are you going somewhere I 
should know about?" he knew what she meant but enjoyed hearing her 
express herself to him instead of trying to be the strong willed 
warrior she wasn't. Shadow Wing was finally becoming comfortable with 
him as she was not as what she wanted to be for him.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> ::Shadow Wing::
> 
> She hugs him back with all her spark. She smiled and whispered into 
> his ear, "If only you could, then I would never wake up, just to be 
> with you and stay with you." She kissed his cheek again.
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> > "As long as your spark is intact I will protect. I made you that 
> > promise and I'd sooner be deleted then fail in that promise." 
> > Lunarpine looked deeply into Shadow Wings big beautiful eyes to 
> show 
> > what his words truly meant, he was throwing instinct to the pit 
and 
> > becoming more complete with each moment with her, his grip on her 
> > hand tightened as he placed his other arm around her shoulder to 
> hold 
> > her in an embracing hug. "If I could enter your mind and face 
your 
> > nightmares you'd never have to worry about the dark again."
> >
